building core_building
{
  convert_to core_castle_building

        construction_cost_bonus_wooden bonus 10 requires event_counter wise_administrator 1 and not event_counter is_the_ai 4 and not event_counter is_the_ai 3

building core_castle_building
{
  convert_to core_building
  levels motte_and_bailey wooden_castle castle fortress citadel
  {
    motte_and_bailey castle requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }
    {
      capability
      {
		    recruit_pool  "Bondir"  1   0.13   1  0  requires factions { norway, denmark, } and hidden_resource denmark or hidden_resource norway
        
        wall_level 0
        tower_level 1
;       free_upkeep bonus 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter thinks_of_his_people 1
        population_growth_bonus bonus 1 requires hidden_resource capital
		religion_level bonus 2 requires event_counter is_the_ai 4
		religion_level bonus 1 requires event_counter is_the_ai 3 and not event_counter is_the_ai 4

      {
        tower_level 3
      }

    }
  }

building castle_barracks
{
  convert_to barracks
  levels mustering_hall garrison_quarters drill_square barracks armoury
  {
    mustering_hall castle requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }
    {
      capability
      {
        recruit_pool    "Peasants"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { england, france, hre, denmark, spain, aragon, portugal, }
        recruit_pool    "Peasants"  1   0.15   2  0  requires factions { teutonic_order, pisa, venice, papal_states, }
        recruit_pool    "Drengjar"  0.5   0.15   1  0  requires factions { norway, } and hidden_resource norway
        recruit_pool    "Scots Skirmisher"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { scotland, }
